prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Tote Bag "Fearless" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for bag placement. Tote bag laid flat, handles spread to sides.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets (likely for ventilation or decoration, dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver).
- PRINT/GRAPHIC: "Fearless" text or graphic clearly visible on the bag body.
- STYLE: Classic tote bag with two handles.
- Material: 100% cotton canvas - sturdy, durable tote fabric.
- Handles should be natural canvas or matching Sunset Orange.

STYLING: Bag laid perfectly flat. Handles spread naturally to sides. Main body of bag flat and smooth.

COLOR: Match the EXACT Sunset Orange from the input image - vibrant, saturated orange. No fading or color shifts.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. Show canvas texture and print clearly.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. Clean, minimal presentation.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on Ron Dorff Tote Bag "Fearless" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets are likely positioned on the bag body or near handles
- Show the cotton canvas fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- Stitching and construction details visible

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Show fabric texture and eyelet detail clearly.

COLOR: EXACT Sunset Orange - vibrant, saturated orange.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets against the orange canvas.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
prompts.print:
Detail shot of the "Fearless" print/graphic on Ron Dorff Tote Bag "Fearless" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- "Fearless" text or graphic clearly visible
- Show the print technique (screen print, etc.)
- Canvas texture visible
- Clean, legible presentation of the design

COMPOSITION: Close-up of the print area on the tote bag body. Show the design clearly and prominently.

COLOR: Match the EXACT Sunset Orange canvas from the input image. Print color should contrast appropriately (likely white or black).

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show print details sharply.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
